myminio_bucket_linked: A user linked an My MinIO bucket to a project
myminio_bucket_unlinked: A user unselected an My MinIO bucket in a project
myminio_file_added: A user added a file to an My MinIO bucket in a project
myminio_file_removed: A user removed a file in an My MinIO bucket in a project
myminio_file_updated: A user updated a file in an My MinIO bucket in a project
myminio_folder_created: A user created a folder in an My MinIO in a project
myminio_node_authorized: A user authorized the My MinIO addon for a project
myminio_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the My MinIO addon for a project
myminio_node_deauthorized_no_user: My MinIO addon for a project deauthorized
